languages.text: "Все было продуманной и поставленной пьесой с самого начала, не так ли?"
"This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"
languages.original_text: "Все было продуманной и поставленной пьесой с самого начала, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "It was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"
"It was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"
"This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"
"This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"
"This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"
"This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

languages.text: "Das war alles ein sorgsam arrangiertes Spektakel, oder?"
languages.original_text: "This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Das war alles ein sorgsam arrangiertes Spektakel, oder?"

languages.text: « Tout cela n'était qu'un spectacle soigneusement orchestré, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout cela n'était qu'un spectacle soigneusement orchestré, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: “这一切都是精心策划好的，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是精心策划好的，没错吧？”

languages.text: «Esto ha sido todo un espectáculo premeditado, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: «Esto ha sido todo un espectáculo premeditado, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「これはすべて、綿密に仕組まれた見世物だったんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: 「これはすべて、綿密に仕組まれた見世物だったんだろう？」

languages.text: "Bütün bunlar özenle planlanmış bir kumpastı, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "This was all one carefully orchestrated spectacle, wasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Bütün bunlar özenle planlanmış bir kumpastı, değil mi?"
